alert.note: Alert for Crockett; Dyer; Lauderdale (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 07 at 3:55AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Crockett, southeastern Dyer and northeastern Lauderdale Counties through 430 AM CST... At 355 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Halls, or 10 miles south of Dyersburg, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Halls, Chestnut Bluff, Unionville, Friendship, Gates, South Fork, Poplar Grove, Hawkinsville, Fowlkes, Crockett Mills, Bonicord, Double Bridges, Elizabeth, Stokes, Maury Junction, Tigrett and Hodson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CST for western Tennessee.
